http://www.weebly.com/terms-of-service/

Under terms 14. Themes

“If you choose, you may contribute website themes ("Custom Themes") to the Service for use by other users. You hereby grant and agree to grant us an exclusive, perpetual, sublicensable, worldwide, irrevocable, royalty-free right and license to use, copy, modify, and create derivative works of any Custom Themes contributed by You to the Service, including the HTML code and media assets therefor.”


If you choose to share your custom theme you waive all your right over the theme.

text:
http://www.weebly.com/terms-of-service/ 



Under terms 14. Themes

“If you choose, you may contribute website themes ("Custom Themes") to the Service for use by other users. You hereby grant and agree to grant us an exclusive, perpetual, sublicensable, worldwide, irrevocable, royalty-free right and license to use, copy, modify, and create derivative works of any Custom Themes contributed by You to the Service, including the HTML code and media assets therefor.”



If you choose to share your custom theme you waive all your right over the theme.




André - An_dz
